generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Overworld Height Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Noise parameters used to drive terrain height in the Overworld.

fields.title: Noise Params
fields.description: First value is depth - more negative means deeper underwater, while more positive means higher. Second value is scale, which affects how much noise changes as it moves from the surface.

fields.title: Noise Type
fields.description: Specifies a preset based on a built-in setting rather than manually using noise_params
